message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm looking for $120 for it.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay up to $95 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $110, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I'd like to counter with $100 for the product.
